metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7479 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
OpenVPN versions before 2.3.15 and before 2.4.2 are vulnerable to reachableassertion when packet-ID counter rolls over resulting into Denial ofService of server by authenticated attacker.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7479` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.4.0-5ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.0-5ubuntu1').
